name: Ego Maid Café
description:
Hello there! This is a visual novel game where you, the player, are going to this café that you heard about by some means. And you're all set and ready to go on your first meeting with your host: Darkiplier. It's almost like a Tamagotchi kind of game so, have fun with it! Mess around and see what easter eggs you can snag up, haha

As I mentioned in the game, this is a project that I did to do the following:

To help raise awareness for a friend’s circumstance (My friend is currently struggling to get funds and could really use all the help they could get. Even if you cannot donate personally, I would appreciate it if you could circulate the game so that the word is spread!!! You can find them here:

instagram: https://www.instagram.com/strigidaemon/ 

ko-fi: https://ko-fi.com/strigidaemon

Practice programming ( I am in the middle of making another game, similar in what it is but not in content, though it is based off the egos. More can be found here: https://www.quotev.com/story/13425457/Untitled-Game-Progress-Book)

Practice drawing (I am not the greatest at drawing expressions and keeping consistencies, so this was excellent practice. It will be needed for the game I mentioned above--^)

And....yep! That's all I got for you. It's a fairly short game admittedly but feel free to take your time with it! Have fun! And if you decide to play it,  feel free to let me know!!! I'd love to hear y'all's reactions!!!
